alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Haskell; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 9:58PM CDT until May 22 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HASKELL...NORTHEASTERN CALLAHAN...SHACKELFORD AND SOUTHWESTERN THROCKMORTON COUNTIES... At 958 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albany, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Albany around 1005 PM CDT. Ibex around 1025 PM CDT. Moran around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mccarty Lake, Us-283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line, Us- 180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line and Lusk. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
